name: Super Flood Free
description:
Super flood is a very addictive puzzle game. In addation to the classic square grids board, this game supports triangle & hexagon grids board, which is even more fun and challenging than the classic board.

The objective of the game is to flood the whole board with one color. The flood area start from the top-left corner, and progressively floods into the adjacent grids color by color. The fewer steps to flood the board, the higher score you get.

Features:
- Square grid board
- Triangle grid board
- Hexagon grid board
- Small/Medium two size of board for each type

Features in the full version:
- Large size board
- Advertisements free
